item.description:
Light appetizers will be provided. This will be a nice opportunity to meet and network with other Midwesterners as well as people from Boston. Feel free to invite others, just please let us know ahead of time how many you will be bringing as the restaurant requests a final head count.

Sonsie is in Boston on Newbury Street and is less than a block from the Hynes Convention Center Station on the T (Green Line). Hope you can make it!
item.why: Hey there Success Addicts! Join us for a collaborative networking event at Sonsie on Newbury Street - Feb 8th at 6:00pm - This will be a chance to meet new people, discuss your business and profession, uncover synergies, and build relationships!
item.name: FREE Networking Event Feb 8th at Sonsie on Newbury Street
